jobDescription: Informatica MDM Architect/Developer  Highly experienced in Informatica MDM MDE implementations.  Well-versed with Informatica Power Center and Informatica Data Quality tool.  Provides architecture perspective and implementation view, identifying major system interfaces and development of reusable modules  Refine Informatica MDM HUB design and configuration  Highly knowledgeable with MDM services & technical features, including user exits and IDD/Provisioning Tool interfaces  Establish/Build Java API/Service Layer to feed and publish data into/out MDM  Establish a CRUD solution to consume data, establish/integrate with MDM and making the mastered data available for provisioning  Informatica IDQ experience a must  Knowledge of core O&G; domains (Wells, Plant/Facility, Customer, Vendor, Materials, HR a huge plus)
